justification: The candidate has strong technical skills but lacks explicit B2B sales experience, which is a key component of the job description.
Leadership is primarily demonstrated through project work rather than managing teams or projects at a large scale.
No mention of strategic thinking related to business development or B2B sales strategies.
Candidate's technical expertise and education align with requirements in IT sector, but no direct experience in manufacturing sector is noted.

requirements.criteria: Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries

input.job_description:
### Join Apex Global Solutions as a Business Development Manager  

Apex Global Solutions is seeking a dedicated Business Development Manager to bolster our B2B sales efforts and enhance our market presence. This role requires a strategic thinker with the ability to forge and maintain robust client relationships, lead market analysis, and drive revenue growth through innovative sales strategies.

#### Key Responsibilities  
- Develop and implement strategic business development plans to meet organizational goals.
- Identify and qualify new business opportunities and partnerships.
- Lead market research to determine new market segments and customer needs.
- Foster long-term relationships with clients through successful engagement and collaboration.
- Track and report on key business metrics, providing insights and data-driven recommendations to executive leadership.
- Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment and excellence in service delivery.

#### Required Skills  
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proven experience in B2B sales and marketing, particularly in IT and manufacturing sectors.
- Proficient in market research and data analysis.
- Strong leadership and project management capabilities.

#### Benefits  
- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
- Health and wellness benefits package.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.

Join us to spearhead business growth initiatives that deliver significant value and drive our mission forward.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE    
       
At Software Alliance     
Machine Learning Engineer                                                                                                                             Jan 2024 – June 2024    
                                                                 As a Machine Learning Engineer at S oftware Alliance , I have taken on the following 
responsibilities:    
•  Chatbot using Llama  2 : I used hadit custom dataset that scraped from website and deployed model by using FAST API’s 
finetune Llama 2  different version  and get good results on custom datasets.

used all  mention LLMs and compare results for chat bot output and factor(Empathy, Fluency, Informative and 
coherence ).  
• Laptop Price Classification : Algorithms  that Used  are KNN, Decision Tree, Random Forest . Accuracy: Achieved 94% 
accuracy in predicting laptop price ranges (small, medium, high)    
• Airline Flight Price Prediction by using Regression : Algorithms Used: KNN, Decision Tree, Random Forest (as 
regressors)     
R Square: Achieved 90% R square using Random Forest Regressor for predicting airline flight prices.    
• Plant Disease Detection using CNN : Image Classification . Approach: Employed deep learning CNN  
Performance: Achieved perfect accuracy (1.0) in detecting plant diseases across three classes of images.  
• Balls detection  
Description:  Annotate  the custom  images  of football  and make  labels  and images.  Trained  yolov 8n on my 
own dataset  and get good  result  on validation.   
At Selteq    
Machine Learning Engineer  Intern                                                                                                                Aug 2023 –  Jan 2024   
                                                                 As a Machine Learning Engineer at Selteq, I have taken on the following responsibilities:    
• Developed and deployed two machine learning models. The first model accurately predicts whether a given file is an 
invoice, bill, or an unknown format, enhancing document categorization efficiency.    
• Worked on a hate speech detection model, classifying paragraphs as hate speech, offensive, or normal. This contribution 
promotes online safety and responsible content.    
• Utilized Django web framework to deploy these models, making them accessible through a user -friendly web interface.    
• Implemented RESTful APIs for seamless integration, allowing external systems to utilize the models' capabilities.    • Working on Desktop application of attendance system. In which attendance by image.    
At FAST National University of Computer and Emerging Science CFD Campus                        2021 – 2022    
Teaching Assistant at AI lab    
As a teaching assistant at the AI lab, your responsibilities include creating tasks for students    
using AI algorithms. Here is the requested information presented in equal -sized bullet points:    
• Developed and implemented AI -driven curriculum modules, resulting in a 25% increase in student engagement and 
a 15% improvement in overall academic performance.    
• Created and deployed AI -based learning tasks for 50+ students, resulting in a 40% improvement in comprehension 
and application of AI algorithms within the lab environment.    
    
ACADEMIC PROJECTS    
    
           
Market Tempest    
• The project aims to integrate multiple E -commerce platforms into a unified solution using runtime scraping.    
• Frontend Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React JS are used to develop an intuitive and user -friendly 
interface.

commerce data efficiently.   
• Backend Implementation: Node.js is employed as the backend technology to handle server -side operations and 
facilitate seamless communication between the frontend and database.   
Rating bot    
• AI-powered sentiment analysis: The Rating Bot utilizes advanced NLP algorithms to analyze text input and determine 
sentiment .    
• Quick, accurate, and scalable: Provides businesses with a fast and precise method of gathering customer feedback at 
scale.    
• Seamless integration: The Rating Bot can be easily integrated into existing customer service platforms, enhancing 
the feedback collection process.    
Analyzing Sentiments on Imdb: A Deep Learning Approach with TensorFlow    
    
•   Explore the intricate world of sentiment analysis on Imdb dataset using advanced machine learning techniques. This 
project employs TensorFlow, a powerful deep learning framework, to unravel sentiments embedded in Twitter data. 
Gain insights into the emotio nal pulse of tweets, understand public opinions, and unlock the potential of sentiment 
analysis for diverse applications.

SKILLS & COMPETENCIES

Science,  Sklearn  Pandas, Numpy, Django, Rest API, FAST API’s,  Generative AI, LLM, Prompt Engineering, TensorFlow, Spacy, 
matplotlib.
